column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday May 18 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: UPDATE:  I-75S between Exit 95 and Exit 90 in Madison Co:
column4: The roadway is now reportedly back open.

column3: UPDATE:  I-75S between Exit 95 and Exit 90 in Madison Co:
column4: Traffic remains backed up into Fayette Co.  Motorists can continue to expect long delays while traffic flow returns to normal.
